name: places/ChIJL8rJGHn1wokRI4ppmCFajCg
adrFormatAddress: 2322 3rd Ave, Bronx, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: My daughter will be 6 months and still has not been added to my case for medicaid, snap, and cash assistance.  The hospitals are trying to bill me personally for her visits.  This is neglect.  I have been to this office center number 023 several times.  I have called and sent faxing, you name it.  Still, nothing has been done to fix the error on my case.

text.text: My daughter will be 6 months and still has not been added to my case for medicaid, snap, and cash assistance.  The hospitals are trying to bill me personally for her visits. originalText.text: Every member of the City Council should be ashamed of how these offices are run. Over four hours waiting just to get an update on a application not available by phone or through the mobile app… and finding that should have been sent to the 4th floor. So much time wasted for people who need to be pursuing making money.

originalText.text: Terrible. No phone calls are answered and they don't call you back. In other words  local offices have done away with Rep Phone Support,. Making a visit to a Hra the only option for comminication.

originalText.text: This place is so disorganized the staff have a nasty attitude place they act like they are doing you favor which they’re not I did ny recertification since June and I have not received any status about  my case. Than other people trying to get help they are just plain rude to other clients besides me getting SNAP SHOULD NOT BE THIS HARD DISGUSTING SERVICE!!!!
